data.text: @Sandraxf That look like Castle , but it is not Castle....I shall never look !!!
@Sandraxf Let me tell you how Terri and Andy will treat the viewers: Sunshine, passion, tension x6; happy x 1, and will end with you never wanting to see the show again.
@LiloAuntie @Sandraxf It is a shame that it has to be on ABC:( Still on the fence if I will watch it or not. ABC ruined Castle. Too bad they had to go with ABC.
@Sandraxf @TerriEdda @AndrewWMarlowe Wishing you all the success of Castle and more.  PLEASE don't leave this show, we know what happens
@Sandraxf @Sandraxf @TerriEdda @AndrewWMarlowe You've got my attention.I'm ready for another super show from the folks in your picture.#TakeTwoABC #TakeTwo #taketwo
